name: ConjoinedShips
description:
ConjoinedShips : Create a blob of spaceships !

  • Use your ship to defeat waves of enemies.
  • You can collect your defeated foes to merge them to your ship.
  • Merged foes become protection.
  • Merged ships fire when you do.

Controls :

  • Move : LeftStick or WASD or Arrows
  • Aim : RightStick or Mouse
  • Fire : RightTrigger or LeftMouseButton
